name: sanguinary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
extremely violent and involving a lot of blood and injuries: It was the most sanguinary and expensive war in modern times. The film moves with a furious momentum toward its sanguinary conclusion.
covered with or full of blood: She fled down the stairs, slamming the door on his sanguinary hand. They refused to eat the sanguinary meat.
relating to or like blood: As it dries, blood develops many subtle sanguinary variations. Most of Kapoor's recent work is either mirrored or a deep sanguinary red.
